text:
Hagen Reinhold (born 23 March 1978) is a German politician. He was born in Wismar. He is a member of the Free Democratic Party (FDP). Reinhold has served as a member of the Bundestag from the state of Mecklenburg-Vorpommern since 2017.
On 12 March 2020, during the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic, it was made clear that Reinhold had tested positive for COVID-19.
